vl-ui-modal demo

Meer voorbeelden en documentatie.

Modal, zonder button en content

                
                    <button is="vl-button" data-vl-modal-open="modal-1">Open</button>
                    <vl-modal></vl-modal>

Modal, closable

                
                    <button is="vl-button" data-vl-modal-open="modal-cl">Open</button>
                    <vl-modal id="modal-cl" data-title="Modal 2" closable></vl-modal>

Modal, closable maar niet automatisch closable

                
                    <button is="vl-button" data-vl-modal-open="modal-cl-na">Open</button>
                    <vl-modal id="modal-cl-na" data-title="Modal 2" closable not-auto-closable></vl-modal>

Modal, closable en niet cancellable

                
                    <button is="vl-button" data-vl-modal-open="modal-cl-nc">Open</button>
                    <vl-modal id="modal-cl-nc" data-title="Modal 3" closable not-cancellable></vl-modal>

Modal, manual open/close

                
                    <script type="text/javascript">
                        function openModal(id) {
                            document.querySelector('#' + id).open();
                        }
                    </script>

                    <button id="button-open-modal-ma" is="vl-button" onclick="openModal('modal-ma')">Open</button>
                    <vl-modal id="modal-ma" data-title="Modal 6">
                        <span slot="content">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</span>
                        <button is="vl-button" slot="button">Aanvraag starten</button>
                    </vl-modal>

Modal met functie op sluit actie

"Voeg listener toe" button is voor demo doeleinden. 
                
                    <div is="vl-action-group">
                        <button id="button-open-modal-lis" is="vl-button" data-vl-modal-open="modal-lis">Open</button>
                        <button id="add-listener" is="vl-button" onclick="voegCloseListenerToe()">Voeg listener toe</button>
                    </div>

                    <vl-modal id="modal-lis" data-title="Modal 7" closable>
                        <span slot="content">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</span>
                        <button is="vl-button" slot="button">Aanvraag starten</button>
                    </vl-modal>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
                        function voegCloseListenerToe() {
                            document.querySelector("vl-modal[id=\"modal-lis\"]").on('close', event => document.querySelector("#button-open-modal-lis").innerText = 'Lach de lach der dwazen');
                        }
                    </script>
